title: Blended Learning Design and Implementation Strategies for Vocational Education

context.prior_knowledge: Job-Related Basic Language Proficiency and Digital Device Usage Experience
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen immediately applicable language skills for practicing professionals, offering personalized learning experiences using individual devices

learning_goals: Learners can integrate digital tools with face-to-face activities in blended learning environments to perform language tasks with over 80% accuracy
Learners can recreate authentic workplace scenarios using VR simulations and apply at least three language communication strategies
Learners can revise personalized learning plans based on formative assessment feedback and improve goal achievement rates by over 70% within two weeks
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
